Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller

Class GroupController

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.controller.GroupController
@Controller public class GroupController extends Object
Group controller determines the group behavior in the application

    • addSave

      @RequestMapping(value="/addgroup", method=POST) public String addSave(@ModelAttribute("group") Group group, @RequestParam(value="rev",required=false) long[] rev, @RequestParam(value="lone",required=false) long lone, @RequestParam(value="ltwo",required=false) long ltwo, @RequestParam(value="facetoface",required=false) long facetoface, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)

    • editgroup

      @GetMapping("/editgroup/{id}") public Object editgroup(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redir, @PathVariable("id") long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      editgroup takes user to the edit group page where use can make changes to evaluator, reviewee and group attributes.
      Parameters:
      redir -
      id - of the group being edited
      model - model is the a model object use to add attributes to a web page
      Returns:
      user to the group edit page

    • update

      @RequestMapping(value="/updategroup{id}", method=POST) public String update(@PathVariable("id") long id, @RequestParam(value="rev",required=false) long[] rev, @RequestParam(value="eval",required=false) long[] eval, @RequestParam(value="role",required=false) int[] roles, @RequestParam(value="issync",required=false) boolean[] issync, @RequestParam(value="isprev",required=false) boolean[] isprev, @RequestParam(value="form",required=false) EvalTemplates form, @RequestParam(value="selfeval",required=false) boolean self, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
      update group save changes to the group
      Parameters:
      id - of the group being edited
      rev - return a new list of reviewee
      eval - list of evaluators
      roles - list of roles
      issync - determines if a evaluator is issync or not
      isprev - is the evaluation able to be previewed
      form - what form is associated with the group
      self - is self evaluation needed
      model -
      Returns:
      user back to the edit group page

    • downloadEvalGroupResults

      @GetMapping("/download_eval_group_results/{groupId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> downloadEvalGroupResults(@PathVariable("groupId") long groupId) throws Exception

      Parameters:

      Returns:
